name: Pox Faulds
flavorText: Made from the treated skin of plague victims.
flavorTextHtml: Made from the treated skin of plague victims.

secondary.textHtml: When 3 or more enemies are within 12 yards, you release a vile stench that deals 492% weapon damage as Poison every second for 5 seconds to enemies within 15 yards. [450 - 550]%
